registerDone.title: You've been registered to In&Out
registerDone.text: We have sent you an email. Open it and click on the link to activate your account.

logged.emptyOrders: You have not made any order
logged.emptyCards: You do not have any In&Out card yet
logged.emptyAppointments: You do not have any appointments yet

deleted.title: We have deleted your account
deleted.message: If you have improvements, doubts or complaints please do not hesitate to write to this email:

confirm.title: NOW YOU CAN USE YOUR ACCOUNT
confirm.message: Your account is now active. Click here to log in to your account.

home.title: ENJOY ALL THE PRIVILEGES OF HAVING AN ACCOUNT:
home.create-message: I want to create a new account

recoverDone.title: We've sent you an email:
recoverDone.text: To use your account enter your webmail and click on the link that we have sent you. There We will ask you to enter your password.

resetDone.title: Now you can use your In&Out account:
resetDone.text: We have already saved your new password. Click here to log in to your account.
